DOC.brief_summary: To compare combined spinal epidural , epidural IV pethidine analgesia effect mother , fetus , newborn course labor .
DOC.brief_title: Analgesia Labor , Prospective Parallel Study Compare Regional Analgesia Intravenous ( IV ) Pethidine Analgesia
DOC.detailed_description: This prospective parallel single blind study , approve institutional review board El-Galaa Teaching Hospital , research ethic committee Faculty Pharmacy , Cairo University . This hospital per si select study large hospital could provide study diverse population . It population various socio-economic status . This would provide study sample patient wide range characteristic . Sixty full-term , ASA physical status I II nulliparous woman active labor cervical dilatation 5 cm cephalic presenting fetus randomly assign one five group provide informed consent . - Group 1 : receive CSE analgesia , 25 µg fentanyl inject intrathecally bolus dose 10 ml 0.5 % lidocaine inject epidurally . E top-ups 5-10 ml 0.5-0.8 % lidocaine inject upon request . - Group 2 : receive CSE analgesia , 25 µg fentanyl inject intrathecally bolus dose 10 ml 0.0625 % bupivacaine inject epidurally . E top-ups 5-10 ml 0.0625-0.25 % bupivacaine inject upon request . - Group 3 : receive 50µg E fentanyl analgesia inject intrathecally bolus 10 ml 0.5 % lidocaine administer catheter , follow lidocaine E top-ups 5-10 ml 0.5-0.8 % upon request . - Group 4 : receive analgesia , 50 µg E fentanyl inject intrathecally bolus dose 10 ml 0.125 % bupivacaine administer catheter , follow E bupivacaine top-ups 5-10 ml 0.125-0.25 % upon request . - Group 5 : 50 mg IV pethidine administer load dose , follow 0.5 mg/kg , total maximum limit 130 mg. Study Subjects Excluding Criteria Patients diabetes mellitus , neurological disease , pre-eclampsia , patient receive parenteral analgesic patient contraindication E spinal analgesia , patient sensitivity local anesthetic opioids exclude study . Study Method All recruit subject screen administration analgesia . Systolic diastolic pressure , heart rate peripheral oxygen saturation ( SpO2 ) monitor . Fetal heart rate ( FHR ) monitor use external cardiotocograph monitor ( Partoconter NST Nihon Kohden ) . For E group , degree motor block assess accord modify Bromage scale ( Grade I : free movement legs foot ; Grade II : able flex knee free movement foot ; Grade III : unable flex knee , free movement foot ; Grade IV : unable move legs foot ) administration E analgesia , 10 30 minute first dose . The start analgesia regard time 0 . The duration analgesia take time begin analgesic injection ( time 0 ) time request additional analgesia . The number analgesic top-up record interval top-up , addition volume concentration drug inject . The Visual Analogue Pain Scale ( VAS ) ( 0 mm = pain , 100 mm = bad pain imaginable ) measure administration analgesia , 10 30 minute administration analgesic dose delivery baby . Maternal arterial pressure , heart rate , SpO2 , FHR note analgesia give , afterwards every 30 minute delivery . Maternal temperature record start analgesic regimen thereafter every hour till end labor . Fever define temperature ≥ 38˚C . The duration stage labor together mode delivery record . The total volume drug inject , total concentration drug inject , 1-min 5-min APGAR score , weight neonate record . Any experienced drug relate problem recruit subject record .
DOC.criteria: fullterm , ASA physical status I II nulliparous woman active labor cervical dilatation 5 cm cephalic presenting fetus Patients diabetes mellitus , neurological disease , preeclampsia , patient receive parenteral analgesic patient contraindication E spinal analgesia , patient sensitivity local anesthetic opioids exclude study .
